name: Bardtronics
description: Bardtronics believes that piloting a mech is not just a science, but an art. They offer premium musical components for the sophisticated mech pilot.

name: BMI Standards Co
description: BMI Standards Co. is a well established company, they set the standards for, and still lead with the highest quality, neural interface systems.

name: Iriscorp
description: Iriscorp has a long history of manufacturing high-quality, high performance computing and interface components.

name: Scorpio Logistics
description: Scorpio is an excellent resource for weaponry and augments to meet specific needs. Their expertise in tracking and ballistic weaponry is always a valuable asset.

name: Protos Industries
description: The standard for industrial and military grade machinery, they've evolved over the years to cover many areas of technology, but their simple sturdy designs are unchanging.

name: Perwares Electronics
description: Perwares is a classic for budget mechaneers everywhere.

name: Progressive Globotech
description: A joint venture by the members of the Moscow Combine, Prog Globo is the result of megacorporations throwing money at problems. They mass produce products that do the job, but are often over-engineered and sometimes a bit flaky.

name: Nadornia Cybernetics
description: Known for their dependable precision joints and high speed application specific computer parts, as well as their lightweight frameworks.

name: Moscow Instruments
description: While MI doesn't have the best reputation in industry, they produce reliable, easy-to-repair components. They probably didn't steal the intellectual property from another company.

name: Nebulon Inc
description: Famed for their top-of-the-line advanced weaponry, and high quality materials.

name: Ultraco
description: Before the war, Ultraco was the copy-cat company, making cheaper replicas of best sellers, but after contracts during the war they've changed into the quality, sometimes eccentric, manufacturer they are now.

name: Cryobank
description: A premium of manufacturer of high-end cooling equipment.

name: Apex Integration
description: After their typical strategies failed in the post-war economy, Apex has been trying many varied product lines, trying to get something to stick.

name: Anpidor Energies
description: Anpidor has a reputation for high quality, high power plants for any occasion.

name: Kasosonic
description: Kasosonic is has a long history of good build quality components and a wide range of options from budget to luxury.

name: ESC Group
description: The ESC group evaporated mid-war when their factories were the target of coordinated attacks. Nonetheless their high-end parts still circulate the markets.

name: Ter Threpnicus Industries
description: The manufacturing arm of the polical-relligious-economic power that is Ter Threpnicus.

name: Atlas Power
description: Atlas power is an industry leader in highly advanced power systems. Many designs appear to be based on concepts that were emerging technologies mostly lost during the war, suggesting Atlas Power may have access to golden age data other companies don't.

name: Stigma Manufacturing
description: Built upon the military intelligence, violent battles, and sacrifices of its founders' past, this company produces some of the most violent and unorthodox weapons.

name: Familiar Industries
description: An eccentric company focusing on the production of equally eccentric frames. They are well known for their eloborate marketing stunts and events.

name: Vincent's
description: Never again will cramps or claustrophobia seize you when you are using one of Vincent's Mech Cabins! Our cabins are made using modern Spacial Maximization Strategies (SMS) to ensure that you have easy access to your controls and have space for all of your favorite accessories and decals, all while enjoying the finest luxury interior on the market. Our Vincent Mech Frames have been optimized for stability and security so that you can further enjoy the luxury and comfort of your Vincent Mech Cabin.

name: Erimos Mining Corp.
description: The largest mining company on Erimos they have spread to mining operations on some other planets too. They produce exclusively mining equipment.
